page.title: 15SOCIAL CLUB/LONGTOWN,CUMBRIA
page.content: The Longtown Social Club has been running some ten years.It took over the premises of The Liberal Club, in Swan Street,an organisation which has met there, and still does,for over 100 years.The membership of the social club is over 1000,many of whom are ladies.The club is run by a committee of fifteen elected members,and four officers.The organisation achieved an annual turnover in the 84/85 of Â£104,000.It is a non-profit_making club, and all monies are ploughed back into improving facilities for members.Recently a new Lounge, and a Concert_Room were added.There are many varied activities,Bingo/two nights, cinema on Wednesday,Saturday Night Dance,Snooker,Carpet_Bowls,Darts.The club football team won the Carlisle & District lst Div in 1985.Much efforts go into fund raising for charities.
